thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Misc

author: Misc
title: Misc
text: I was disappointed in this site. I had been led to believe that all my tickets had been removed as I had sold them successfully on another site. I then was very surprised to find that they were still be advertised (despite me checking they had been removed). I was then charged $100 admin fee for having sold the tickets already, despite me emailing the company to let them know I had already sold them. I tried to dispute it, but eventually they took the $100 without further contact. I would not use this site again.
